channel.title: hashcat on I am hacking
channel.description: Recent content in hashcat on I am hacking

item.title: Testing hashcat
item.description: So, this time around I will give hashcat a spin. Had a bit of trouble getting started. The install was easy enough, just download, unarchive and put a symlink in path, but installing required OpenCL took me a while. Or, actually, just figuring out what the heck I had to install was the hard part. I’m on a ThinkPad X1 with integrated Intel grahics, so I had to install OpenCL Runtimes for Intel Processors.
